QuestData.Title: Jung Duk
QuestData.Description: THIS. IS. WAR.$B$BI will have the heads of everyone who took Lin from me. EVERYONE!$B$BWe will begin with the Osul leader, Jung Duk.$B$BTake this Shado-Pan war banner and place it at the center of their camp.$B$BJung Duk will have no choice but to face you.$B$BShow him no mercy, $n.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: The leader of the Osul yaungol. Bring him down!
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant the Shado-Pan Banner on the Ceremonial Pile, then kill Jung Duk.
QuestData.CompletionText: Jung Duk's legacy is written in the blood of innocents.
QuestData.RewardText: Jung Duk is dead at last.$B$BHundreds, perhaps thousands, lost their lives due to his violent aggression.$B$BThough they are not here to witness his demise, they owe deep gratitude to your bravery today.
